scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd ../../../FullStackOpen/part2/ && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item dist ../../fullstackopenreact/part3part1/part3part1/
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m '' && git push origin main
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy
